name: Edinborough Soy Sauce
description: Add a sweet and salty touch to a variety of Asian dishes and more with this special Soy Sauce. Its unique and interestingly mild taste comes from a combination of soybeans, wheat, salt and caramel. You can use it to make Asian vegetable stir-fry, chicken adobo, slow cooked Asian BBQ ribs and many other delicious recipes. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
